parallel_invoke Variadic Template Function

Summary

An implementation of parallel_invoke that uses C++11 variadic templates to evaluate an arbitrary number of functions in parallel.

Header

#define TBB_PREVIEW_VARIADIC_PARALLEL_INVOKE 1
#include "tbb/parallel_invoke.h"

Syntax

template<typename Func0, typename Func1, typename... Functions>
void parallel_invoke(Func0&& f0, Func1&& f1, Functions&&... f);

Description

This implementation of parallel_invoke uses C++11 variadic templates to accept an arbitrary number of arguments (subject to limitations by a particular compiler). If TBB_PREVIEW_VARIADIC_PARALLEL_INVOKE is set to non-zero, this implementation replaces the default implementation limited by 10 arguments.
